83820.「ありがとうございました。\n また お越しください。\n<turn end>:
Thank you. Please come again.
<turn end>

83821.「青い文字の品物の交換は 一度だけになります。\n 交換したい物を 選んでくださ:
Items in blue can only be exchanged once.
Please select the item you wish to exchange.
<break>

83822.「<%sM_item>を\n おさかなコイン <%nM_Num>枚と\n 交換し:
I'll trade you <%sM_item> for
<%dM_Num> Fish Coins. That all right
with you?
<yesno><break>

83823.<select_se_off>\nさかなを選んで渡す\nさかなを全て渡す\n景品:
<select_se_off>
Exchange Fish
Exchange All Fish
Prize Exchange
Explanation
<select_end><break>

83824.「お持ちのさかなを 全部まとめて\n おさかなコイン <%nM_Num>枚で\n:
I'll take all of those fish off your hands for
<%dM_Num> Fish Coins. What do you say?
<yesno><break>

83825.「<%sM_item>を\n おさかなコイン <%nM_Num>枚で\n 引き取:
I'll give you <%dM_Num> Fish Coins
for your <%sM_item>. How about it?
<yesno><break>

83827.「私ども おさかな交換員は\n お客さまが釣り上げた さかなを\n おさかなコイ:
We, the fish exchangers, exchange the fish you catch for fish coins... The Osakana Coin is a special pass that can only be used
here... If you bring us your coins, we'll exchange them for prizes that match the number of coins... However, if you've locked
up your fish, you can't exchange them... You'll have to unlock it before you can exchange it...

83828.「こちらは おさかな交換員です。\n 本日は いかがなさいますか？\n<brea:
This is the Fish Exchange. What can I do for
you today?
<break>

83926.「おや <%sL_BAG_TYPE>がいっぱいで\n <%sM_item>は\n:
Oh, looks like <%sL_BAG_TYPE> is full and
<%sM_item> can't hold it...<bw_break>

83927.「その景品を交換するには\n おさかなコインが 足りません。\n<bw_brea:
You don't have enough Fish Coins to exchange
for that prize.
<bw_break>

83928.「おや……。\n 交換できるさかなを お持ちでないようですね。\n<bw_bre:
Oh... I'm afraid you don't have any fish to
trade...<bw_break>

84569.「ああっと すみません。\n うまく 交換できなかったようです。\n 時間をおい:
Oh, I'm sorry. Something seems to have gone
wrong with the exchange. Please wait
a little while and try again.
<end>

84570.「<%sM_item>は\n これ以上 交換できません。\n<bw_break>:
I can't exchange for any more of the
<%sM_item>.
<bw_break>

84891.「他に ご用はありますか？\n<break>:
Is there anything else I can help you with?
<break>

84892.「他に 交換したい物は ありますか？\n<break>: Is there anything else you'd like to trade?<break>

84894.「<%sM_item>の しぐさは\n すでに 覚えているようですが\n よろし:
I see you've already memorized the <%sM_item>
gesture, if that's all right.<yesno 2><break>

84895.「どのさかなを 渡していただけますか？\n<break>: Which fish would you like to give me?<break>

<speed=0>
<pc> handed over the
<%sM_item> and received
<%dM_Num> Fish Coins!
<se_nots System 7><bw_break>

<speed=0>
<pc> handed over the
<%sM_item> and received
<%dM_Num> Fish Coins!
<se_nots System 7><end>

85738.「ごめんなさい 紹介の無い方は\n おさかな交換の施設を 利用できないんです。\:
Sorry, I can't allow you to exchange until you have a referral first.
I heard that the Harmos, the fishing guru, was in the southern part of Lendor, so why not go and see him?

<speed=0>
<pc> handed over the King Size
<%sM_item> and received
<%dM_Num> Fish Coins!
<se_nots System 7><end>

90927.「<%sM_item> <%nL_KAUKAZU>個を\n おさかなコイン <%:
I'll give you <%dM_Num> Fish Coins for
your <%dL_KAUKAZU> <%sM_item>.
How does that sound?
<yesno><break>

90928.「<%sM_item>の レシピは\n すでに 覚えているようですが\n よろし:
You already know that recipe. Are you sure
you still want it?
<yesno 2><break>

90933.「<%sM_item>は ２ｎｄディスクの\n レジストレーションコードが入力さ:
The <%sM_item> can only be used and thrown away if the registration code for the 2nd disc has been entered, so... Are you sure you
want to trade <%sM_item> for <%nM_Num> of fish coins?

90950.「<%sM_item>ですね。\n これは <%sL_SYOKUNIN>でないと:
<%sM_item>... This is a recipe that can only
be handled by <%sL_SYOKUNIN>, is that
correct?<yesno 2><break>

90951.「<%sM_item>ですね。\n これは <%sL_SYOKUNIN>でないと:
<%sM_item>... This is a recipe that can only
be made with <%sL_SYOKUNIN>, is that correct?<yesno 2><break>

98102.「釣り老師の石は\n これ以上 交換できません。\n<bw_break>:
You can only exchange for that once, I'm
afraid.
<bw_break>

98103.「釣り老師の石は 港町レンドア南専用の\n ルーラストーンになります。\n 教会:
The Fishing Guru Zoomstone's location is set to South Port Lendor. It can't be changed at a church.
Are you sure you'd like to exchange <%dM_Num> Fish Coins for it?

101932.「このまま さかなを交換しても\n おさかなコインを 持ちきれませんね。\n<b:
Even if we exchange fish like this, we can't hold all the fish coins... We'll exchange them for prizes, reduce the amount of fish
coins, and then give you fish again...

150373.「<%sM_item>は ３ｒｄディスクの\n レジストレーションコードが入力さ:
<%sM_item> can be used to redeem defeat rewards that can only be obtained by entering the registration code for the 3rd disc... Are
you sure you want to trade <%sM_item> for <%nM_Num> fish coins?

158394.「こちらは コンテスト用のさかなですね。\n 登録前に 手放してしまうと 記録と:
This is the fish for the contest... If I let
go of the fish before it's registered, it
won't count as a record, is that okay?<yesno 2><break>

158395.「コンテスト用のさかなが 含まれていますね。\n 登録前に 手放してしまうと 記:
One of the fish included is a contest fish. If
you give it to me before registering it, it
won't count towards your record. That okay?
<yesno 2><break>

202796.「おや……。\n <%sM_item>は ロックをしているため\n 交換すること:
Oh... <%sM_item> is locked and cannot be
replaced...<bw_break>

202797.「おや……。\n 交換できるさかなを お持ちでないようですね。\n ロックしてい:
Oh... You don't have any fish to trade... You
can't trade a fish that's locked...<bw_break>

202839.「<%sM_item>ですね。\n これは 同時に１個までしか\n 置けませんが:
<%sM_item>... You can only place one of these
items at a time, correct?<yesno 2><break>

282853.「そのアイテムは すでに\n レプリカに なっているようですが\n 本当に 交換:
It appears that the item has already been
replicated, but are you sure you want to
trade it?<yesno 2><break>
